name: tm75
effect: Teaches Swords Dance to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Swords Dance to a compatible Pokémon.

flavor_text.black_white: A frenetic dance to uplift the fighting spirit. It sharply raises the user’s Attack stat.
